name: Dead Evil
description:
Shoot Deadites and Survive the night! Dead Evil is a survival mini game slapped together in about 2 weeks for LowRezJam 2020.

Controls

Type 1
A / Left / D-Pad Right .............. Walk Left
D / Right / D-Pad Right ........... Walk Right
K / Z / X (pad) .............................. Shoot
L / X / A (pad)................................ Jump / Double Jump

Type 2

A / Left / D-Pad Right .............. Walk Left
D / Right / D-Pad Right ........... Walk Right
J / Z / X (pad) ............................... Shoot Left
K / X / B (pad) .............................. Shoot Right
L / C / A (pad)................................ Jump / Double Jump

Credits

Art / Game Design
Thomas Mc Closkey

Music
???

Sounds
Emma Robinson

Testing
Ray Frutos
